text: Bus Lane ( or May narok muay yok law) is a 2007 Thai action-comedy film directed by Kittikorn Liasirikun. ==Cast== *Udom Taephanit as Go *Kiat Kitjaroen as Sap *Suthep Po-ngam as Laa *Naowarat Yuktanan as Pawng *Siriphan Cheenchombun as Tik *Arisara Wongchalee as Plaa *Khomsan Nanthajit as Dawn *Prinya Ngamwongwarn *Anchana Phetjinda as tom boy *Pimchanok Ponlabhun as Muay *Achita Sikamana as Suay *Theeratorn Siriphunvaraporn as Chong *Boriwat Yuto ==Release and reception== Bus Lane opened in Thailand cinemas on April 12, 2007. It was No. 1 at the box office on opening weekend, knocking the Thai canine comedy Ma-Mha from the top spot, and beating out the Jim Carrey thriller The Number 23, which opened the same week.Thailand box office, April 12-15, 2007, Box Office Mojo; retrieved 2008-05-07 It held the No. 1 spot for a second week, before dropping to No. 2 in its third week, No. 3 in its fourth week, and finally No. 10 and No. 16 in the subsequent two weeks.Thailand box office, May 17-20, 2007, Box Office Mojo; retrieved 2008-05-07 ==References== == External links == * Category:2007 films Category:Thai films Category:Thai- language films Category:Thai action comedy films Category:RS Film films Category:2007 action comedy films
title: Bus Lane (film)
